name: Sunday Brunch: El Chico's Chorizo
description: All serious eaters know how much I love Robb Walsh's books, so why did it take me so long to discover this seriously delicious chorizo recipe, which I've adapted from Mr. Walsh's brilliant The Tex-Mex Cookbook. As Robb notes in...
recipeIngredient: 1/2 pound boneless pork chops, cut into 4 or 5 pieces

recipeInstructions.text: Combine all of the ingredients except the oil and onion in a food processor. Process until coarsely ground, about 20 seconds.

Heat the oil in a skillet or saute pan over medium-high heat. Stir in the chopped onion. Add the chorizo mixture and brown for 5 minutes to desired doneness. I like mine a little crispy on the outside, so that may take a minute more.
